attributes.action: Dissolve the local parliaments and give more control to the local council authorities
attributes.additional_details:
Dissolve the local parliaments and give more control to the local council authorities. With elected leaders and councillors being elected every 3 years.

Having a fully elected house of lords as the upper chamber and removing the act of parliament to restore the balance of power within the  U.K, leading the way in democracy.

By having the above, this ensures that the UK parliament becomes more responsible and is our centre points of politics. Ensuring that health, policing and and other services are same thought the U.K.
